thread.title: Quick weekend
thread.title_full: Quick weekend - Review of Hilton Garden Inn Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kteuscher
title: Quick weekend
text: We stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn on 8th Avenue for a quick weekend trip. We chose this hotel because it was close to the transportation we needed. It is very close to the Broadway theatres. The hotel was clean and the staff was friendly. Our room was a little run down. It looked like there had been some water damage near the window and the ceiling but the room was very clean.
